clerkInformation.expungementInfo: Contact clerk's office for expungement information

fees.notes: State expungement fees were eliminated in 2024. Some counties may charge administrative processing fees.

procedures.filingLocation: File expungement petitions at the Circuit Court Clerk's office in Lafayette
procedures.daNotification: Petitioner must serve a copy of the petition on the District Attorney's office
procedures.hearingRequired: Hearings may be required for felony expungements; misdemeanors often processed without hearing
procedures.hearingLocation: If hearing required, will be at Macon County Criminal Court
specialNotes: Contact clerk's office for current forms and procedures

timeline.hearingNotice: 2-4 weeks advance notice if hearing required

additionalForms: Certificate of Service (proof of DA service)
Affidavit of Indigency (if requesting fee waiver)
